name: 4runr-gateway
description: 4Runr AI Agent OS - Complete operating system for AI agents with Sentinel safety system

scripts.help: echo 'Available commands:' && echo '  npm run up          - Start all services' && echo '  npm run down        - Stop all services' && echo '  npm run logs        - Show gateway logs' && echo '  npm run build       - Build all packages' && echo '  npm run install     - Install dependencies' && echo '  npm run test        - Run tests' && echo '  npm run lint        - Run linting' && echo '  npm run clean       - Clean build artifacts' && echo '  npm run health      - Check health endpoint' && echo '  npm run ready       - Check readiness endpoint' && echo '  npm run sse-test    - Test SSE endpoint' && echo '  npm run prove-it    - Run Prove-It test'
scripts.health: powershell -Command "try { $response = Invoke-WebRequest -Uri 'http://localhost:8081/health' -UseBasicParsing; $response.Content | ConvertFrom-Json | ConvertTo-Json } catch { Write-Host 'Health check failed: ' + $_.Exception.Message }"
scripts.ready: powershell -Command "try { $response = Invoke-WebRequest -Uri 'http://localhost:8081/ready' -UseBasicParsing; $response.Content | ConvertFrom-Json | ConvertTo-Json } catch { Write-Host 'Readiness check failed: ' + $_.Exception.Message }"
scripts.sse-test: powershell -Command "try { Invoke-WebRequest -Uri 'http://localhost:8081/diagnostics/sse-test' -UseBasicParsing } catch { Write-Host 'SSE test failed: ' + $_.Exception.Message }"
scripts.reset: docker-compose -f infra/docker-compose.yml down -v && docker-compose -f infra/docker-compose.yml up -d

author: 4Runr Team
